summary: The biography of Arnaldo Baptista, founder of Mutantes, has his narrative sewn by emotional testimonies by the artist. Packed with songs that marked the epoch, the film reveals the trajectory of one of the biggest names in Brazilian rock.
cast: Devendra Banhart|Arnaldo Baptista|Lucinha Barbosa|Bill Bartell|Chico Buarque|Luiz Carlos Calanca|Gregory Cheskis|Kurt Cobain|Antonio Carlos da Fontoura|Tárik de Souza|Sérgio Dias|Zélia Duncan|Rogerio Duprat|Koko Gennari|Gilberto Gil|Rita Lee|Clarisse Leite|Dinho Leme|Sean Lennon|Liminha|Lobão|Aluizer Malab|Martha Mellinger|Roberto Menescal|Regina Miranda|Nelson Motta|Os Mutantes|Antônio Peticov|John Ulhoa|Caetano Veloso|Raphael Vilardi|Tom Zé
title: Loki: Arnaldo Baptista
